sentence.Network_en: The court adjudged the dead man's house to his son.
sentence.Network_cn: 法庭把死者的房屋判给他的儿子.

sentence.Network_en: Forensic examination revealed a large quantity of poison in the dead man's stomach.
sentence.Network_cn: 法医检验发现死者的胃里有大量的毒药.

sentence.Network_en: The police have been trying to chase up the dead man's sister, but they have no idea where she lives.
sentence.Network_cn: 警方一直在追寻死者的妹妹, 但他们不知道她住在哪里.

means.word_mean: 1. the fruiting bodies of the fungi of the genus Xylaria

auth_sentence.content: We were waved through and out into a no-man's-land.
auth_sentence.res_content: We were waved through and out into a no-man's-land.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We were waved through and out into a no-man's-land.

auth_sentence.content: He said the man's motive was still unclear.
auth_sentence.res_content: He said the man's motive was still unclear.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He said the man's motive was still unclear.

auth_sentence.content: One man's sprawl is another man's spaciousness.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: One man's sprawl is another man's spaciousness.
